## Technical Implementation Details üîß

### Package Metadata Enhancement

```toml
[project]
name = "gtimes"
version = "0.4.0"
description = "High-precision GPS time conversion and processing library for GNSS applications"
keywords = [
    "gps", "gnss", "time", "conversion", "geodesy", "geophysics", 
    "rinex", "gamit", "globk", "leap-seconds", "coordinate-systems",
    "satellite-navigation", "positioning", "surveying"
]
classifiers = [
    "Development Status :: 4 - Beta",
    "Intended Audience :: Science/Research",
    "Topic :: Scientific/Engineering :: GIS",
    "Topic :: Scientific/Engineering :: Physics",
    # ... 18 total classifiers
]
```

### Distribution Validation Pipeline

```python
Validation Categories:
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ package_structure: File and directory verification
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ pyproject_toml: Metadata and configuration validation
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ documentation: MkDocs build and link verification
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ license_and_legal: Legal compliance verification
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ build_system: Clean build and packaging validation
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ installation_test: Clean environment testing

‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ cli_interface: Command-line tool validation
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ scientific_accuracy: GPS time precision testing
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ pypi_readiness: Publication preparation verification
```
